title: Council Directive 95/412/EC of 25 September 1995 concerning the list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (Finland)
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE  of 25 September 1995 concerning the list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of  Directive 75/268/EEC (Finland) (95/412/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The areas situated in the Republic of Finland which appear in Annexes  I, II and III shall form part of the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the  meaning of Article 3 (3), (4) and (5) of Directive 75/268/EEC.
This Directive is addressed to the Republic of Finland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 September 1995.
For the Council The President L. ATIENZA SERNA
